Name: Assault of the Robots
About the game: Assault of the Robots is an action game where you will fight across different countries like Germany and Great Britain with different robots. Each mission is different and take place in a different location. You will can choose between different weapons and also you will have the possibility to choose the difficulty of the game. Game features: - Cool 2d graphics - Challenging Robot Shooting missions - Modern sci-fi environment - A lot of weapons to choose
